{"body":"Happy jiu jitsu athlete

As a practitioner of jiu jitsu and MMA i need to take recovery seriously. Some friends recommended me to use cannabis oil but i wasn't sure about the psychoactive effects. When i found Harmony and its CBD oil without THC i decided to give it a try.

I never could imagine the quality of sleep i was gonna get. As an athlete, i need to rest accordingly and the oil helped me get that without feeling restless in the morning. After that, i decided to used it in my post workout meals and after a few days i could feel how my recovery was faster.

{"body":"Enjoyable experience through-out

{"body":"Happy jiu jitsu athlete
